pluggable.name: StatusNet
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Post to and display from StatusNet µblog servers.

help.value:
To announce this blog's new posts on a µblog, enter your username, password, and other settings in the StatusNet section of your Profile.

To display µblog notices in a sidebar, add and configure a StatusNet Block on the Themes page.
